name: Alien Craftory
description:
Alien Craftory is a project created for JamCraft 5.

The game is really very short. We can just craft axes and buy wood and iron.

Resources are from:

  • https://beast-pixels.itch.io/crafting-materials
  • https://www.deviantart.com/7soul1/art/420-Pixel-Art-Icons-for-RPG-129892453
  • https://opengameart.org/content/game-ui-simple-outline-squares
  • https://gamesounds.xyz/?dir=The%20Frontier%20-%20RPG%20Set
